name: HyperAGI
description: HyperAGI is the world's first blockchain designed to realise Unconditional Basic Income (UBI) through AGI. It features a robust GPU DePin infrastructure, a decentralised embodied AI computing framework, and personal agents based on exclusive aspect-oriented artificial neural programming. HyperAGI offers a comprehensive technical and product stack for decentralized AGI, including PoUW GPU DePIN for 3D rendering and AI inference, decentralized AI microservices, peer-to-peer 3D AI Gym space, and an LLM-driven AGI agent framework and application.
